Package it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameClient, GameExt
public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game abstract class. Superclass of GameExt (server) and GameClient (client). Manage the all game.
